website_summaries.verdict: Better durability and higher construction quality makes this extension hose good for off-road environments.
pros: Uses high-quality, TPE plastic in the hose and end-fittings
The hose itself is meant to be puncture resistant
Will withstand the common wear  caused by weather and the elements on the road
cons: Uncrushable property of the hose makes it difficult to roll up and store

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this brand and will be last time. The last sewer hoses that I had compacted nicely. When pressed together they would stay compacted and were easy to store in the RV. This brand does not and takes up a lot of space in the RV storage area. The hose it's self seems fine but you can't flex it into the position that you might what because it is so ridged. I will be going back to the last brand that I had the next time that I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn McClymont

customer_reviews.title: First time use, not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Thetford Titan because by friend had one and it looked amazing. It was thicker then the one I had. I thought I would upgrade and get a better drain hose. We weren't able to use the drain hose until after the return window closed. I really like the feel of the product but we have an issue here. IT LEAKS!! I would love to give it a 5 star but have to be real here. Thetford Titan what can you do for me here? I will wait and see! Help me change my review to a 5 star. Thanks, John
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: A great heavy-duty doodie tube
customer_reviews.text: I have had two sewer tubes spring leaks so far, so I ordered this one because it says it's durable. I was impressed with the quality right off the bat. It seems more durable than any I had seen before, and the ends are definitely beefier. It says 10ft on the box but it expands to probably twice that or more. I don't think I will have to worry about leaks with this one, as it seems quite durable yet flexible. I just hope it can endure the Texas sunshine, heat and rocky terrain. I gave it 5 stars and would buy it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Riley's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with adaptor to hook to ground pipe...
customer_reviews.text: It says on the box.."use as extention or on its own" I assumed...that meant.."on its own" right out of the box. So here I am in the dark taping this dang thing to the sewer line in the ground... After realizing my old sewer line has sprung a leak and this was my stow-awayed backup.. CANT RETURN IT ...pass the time frame... I Didn't need it until now(10 months later)...pulled it out..thinking " soooo glad I had a back up" Nope...there is no way to hook it up to the drain..I ran back in the rig and found some thick medical tape that would actually stick to both materials. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Forness

customer_reviews.title: Description says that it also includes end caps and handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Description says that it also includes end caps and handle on an elbow for pipe connection. Guess that the manufacturer forget to put it in the box or the description is incorrectly written. All you will receive is a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described, and seems pretty durable, but it has 2 kinks in it from being folded into the small box. I tried to get them out by hand to no avail. I may try to get the heat gun on it, and see if I cant round them back out. Other than that, seems ok. ends look solid, and connected tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronrizz

customer_reviews.title: Leaked after one use
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a solid replacement for my previous hose which had developed a leak after 2 months of use. However, this one developed a major leak in the middle of the hose after just one use. I didn't even pack it after using it once. A couple days after the first use, I went to use it again and it had a major leak. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Extends further than my old camco hose
customer_reviews.text: Extends further than my old camco hose of the same length, but the cap from the old Camco hose that fits inside the hose does not bottom out which leaves it loose which is odd because it connects to the fitting on the camper tightly. It didn't come with caps which I think it should have and the ones that they sell don't have that great of reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Thetford Hoses stand up to freezing.
customer_reviews.text: We learned this winter through a very unfortunate, expensive, route, that Thetford is the only sewer hose that wouldn't crack outside in the freeze. It was terrible having sewer hose after sewer hose freeze and instantly crack during the first freeze the hoses were outside in. One breaking 10-foot hose was $30! We, so broke, were just heartbroken. I realized a Thetford I had as part of our 2-line RV system was 'still' not cracked and got the picture. Someone in our home did accidentally stretch our main Thetford hose way too far for some crazy reason & it stayed that stretched size. Just don't over-forcefully stretch them..
customer_reviews.author: Night of Starz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be better than the competition.
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be sturdy enough and at least they didn't leak like the Camco brand ones I bought, the first time they were used. The fitting attachment seems to be better than most. But you really cannot judge these hoses until they have been used for several years.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality RV Hose
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rhino hose's for many years for their durability but recently was told these are comparable and upon inspection I believe they will last for several years of heavy use. Product seems well made and couplings are sturdy and very easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extension and this works well with my 15' Thetford hose. Very difficult to compress - like a wild python. Sturdy construction. I stepped on it in the dark and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Avoid they nasty spill.
customer_reviews.text: Many campers have told me the two types of campers.Those that have had a dirty experience when emptying their holding tank and then those who are going to have a bad experience. For that reason I purchased this Heavy duty hose. Substantial thicker material, strongest I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Not great but it hasn't leaked yet
customer_reviews.text: This hose will not stay nested in itself so it takes up much more room than some other types of flexible hoses. The couplers seem very durable and easy to grip and manipulate. No leaks yet. Just wish it would store better.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Well I am changing my review on this, we ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I am changing my review on this, we have used this 3 times as we only need it if we are too far away for our regular hose to reach. It already had a whole and we had to throw away today!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Overschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose as a spare. Everything about it is great, except that when the hose is collapsed (in its shortest state), it stretches itself back out again, unlike other brands. That stay collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Product is no good, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product! We bought this 10' sewer hose in June and within 1-2 months of purchasing my husband noticed a leak. When we replaced it this hose had so many leaks! Amazon said I would have to return the hose to get my money back.. don't think so!
customer_reviews.author: DannyLin

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this because it would not work for my 1990 Coleman popUp camper water waste outlet and I couldn’t find an adapter to get it to work. It cost too much to ship back so now I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended for
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were too plastic-y - not very accordion like if you get my drift. They do what they are intended to do but I like the springy type accordion ones with the orange caps better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zuiderveen

customer_reviews.title: Strong tough very good hose
customer_reviews.text: Works great very strong on the complaint if it doesn't compress back down that easy Angus in this brand for over a year now it's the second one I bought because my old extension wore out
customer_reviews.author: adam duran

customer_reviews.title: interesting design
customer_reviews.text: I like the large attachment end. The hose is odd, but seems like it would be difficult to damage. A little stiffer than a regular sewer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Carlson1038

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Hose doesn't stay collapsed like it's supposed to. The rubber gasket in the female end won't stay in, constantly falls out even when glued back in.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew that it wouldn't match up perfectly with the orange and black piping brand. It fits well enough, but it leaks...and that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: justin l branum

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: It leaks and doesn’t attach securely. Had to hold it he whole time. Gonna just duct tape it to my clear elbow since returning is such a pin in the ass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty! Only three stars because it really isn't flexible for storage and handling. For a more permanent install it would be 5 star..
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Titan hose
customer_reviews.text: This is a good heavy duty hose! The only issue I have is that because of it being a heavy duty hose it does not collapse down like the lighter weight hose does. I can only fit one section of this in my rear bumper, the older lighter hose I could get one in each side.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Believe the bad reviews...buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews..this product is of poor quality..it leaked the first time I used it and, as many other reviews stated, it would not collapse back down after the first use... definitely buy the Rhino brand instead...poor quality product...
customer_reviews.author: SG from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Will use soon
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 4 stars only because I have not used it yet but it seems well made. I will update after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: WagonBurner

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: This hose doesn’t fasten tightly with RV connections, causing leaks. Which you obviously do not want. One end didn’t even have a gasket. How could you mess up such a simple device? It’s unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don't need to store it in compact space
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and I especially appreciate the large end-fitting. BUT, once extended, it will not collapse again. So it was a nightmare getting it back into the wet bay on my motorhome. Gave it away and went back to the Camco I'm not terribly fond of either (for different reasons).
customer_reviews.author: Al_W

customer_reviews.title: Isn't compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy hose and worked great until we tried to put it away. The hose doesn't compress back into it's original shape. It's almost impossible to store it since it's not 10 feet long. I'll be using this as a back up and getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: dawne

customer_reviews.title: Works with Rhino
customer_reviews.text: It's an off-brand Rhino hose, same connections, used our to extend out y adapter since we have 2 dump tubes.. works as it should
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Does not collapse as small  as others.
customer_reviews.text: This hose is pretty stiff, when compared to my normal 15’ dump hose it collapses further together than this 10’ extension.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A Great Poop Slinky
customer_reviews.text: This product hooks easily to my camper and allows waste to flow through it without leaking. I really appreciate that feature.
customer_reviews.author: techie1

customer_reviews.title: Items missing
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to the quality yet but the listing says it comes with the 90 to connect to sewer and it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice RV sewer hose
customer_reviews.text: Great hose for you RV black tank, shell and ends seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Skeet

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that it is hard to make smaller to store. does not retract
customer_reviews.author: Visille Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: A must have for RV'ers
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? A sewer hose is a sewer hose.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyVA

customer_reviews.title: 10' HOSE ONLY!!
customer_reviews.text: Description is for the "15' hose KIT", the 10' hose is all that is included. Not sure how this hasn't been corrected yet, as I'm not the first to make this mistake...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The connectors don't leak like so many other "tough" sewer hoses
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the toughest sewer hose I have bought yet, and I have bought a lot. We shall see how it stands up to sun, cold and abuse. The connectors don't leak like so many other "tough" sewer hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty just hard to store
customer_reviews.text: Nice & heavy duty but won’t fit in bumper or 5in pvc
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hose
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hose. It is sturdy and easy to connect and disconnect with the longer coupling. It is heavier than the cheaper hoses, but it holds up better. You can stand on it and not crush it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste not, want not!
customer_reviews.text: It's efficient and works great. The poop goes where it's suppose and not on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks and easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. No leaks and easy to connect. Seals work well. Unfortunately once it has been opened up, it doesn't collapse fully.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brunetti

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Had the longer version of this hose and need something shorter this 10 ft definitely fits the bill. Grate brand good quality can’t go wrong here
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: A little spendy but worth it. Great quality & is better than any other RV hose we've used.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: Hooks up much easier, than the previse hose and you do not have to wrestle with down spout connector, or hooking two together.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great extension
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for applications where you might need a shorter hose when dumping, etc. Attaches well as an extension when needing a longer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far its been a great quality product, no problems
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: P
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is not accepting negative feedback these days; so .... This service was amazing! I received the product in only FIVE short weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: would not fit in my storage compartment on my toy hauler. nice heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: dads place

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This 10 ft hose fits inside the bumper very nicely. Doesn't push on the bumper caps at all.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price the pop pin holes and least in just a few months
customer_reviews.author: Goodbye girl

customer_reviews.title: Best RV Sewer Hose
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable. Most other hoses are cheap and flimsy - not this one! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Melkovitz

customer_reviews.title: Just what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Time will tell if it lasts for my semi-permanent installation.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Holt

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Flexible
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy. Tough and flexible. I bought this to replace a cheaper one that only lasted a few years at my deer lease. So far so good, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: TexasHornHunter

customer_reviews.title: it works as designed without any leaks which generally is not a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...it works as designed without any leaks which generally is not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Doneitall

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not durable has holes in it already not even 2 months old
customer_reviews.author: michele r belinc

customer_reviews.title: This thing holds a ton of crap!
customer_reviews.text: It's ribbed for personal pleasure and a lovely size & length! It's absolutely gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: John Crapper

customer_reviews.title: Hose is great! It retains what ever shape you put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Hose is great! It retains what ever shape you put it in where my old hose seemed to come alive trying to get it into the storage compartment and kept wanting to jump out. Does appear indestructible
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: but it does not collapse as nice, small and easily as the Dominator by Valterra
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but it does not collapse as nice, small and easily as the Dominator by Valterra.
customer_reviews.author: G. Carroll

product_meta.title: Thetford 17854 Titan 10 Foot RV Sewer Hose Extension
product_meta.description: Proprietary TPE properties provide the highest degree of puncture and abrasion resistance, and help Titan excel in extreme temperatures. Simply put, Titan is the toughest, longest-lasting, best-value sewer hose on the market!
feature_bullets: [VERSATILITY]: Titan 10' can be used to increase the reach of your sewer hose and can be used alone or extend a 15' hose to 20'
[FUNCTIONALITY]: Puncture, abrasion and extreme temperature resistance
[ERGONOMIC]: Comes with the Extended Grip universal bayonet mount , easy to mount on any RV sewer outlet
[DESIGN]: Made of TPE, the hose is uncrushable - bounces back in shape even after being run over by a car

specifications.Model: Titan 10-Foot Premium RV Sewer Hose Extension
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars318 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
